name: Stop devices isolation
description: Stops isolation on the specified devices.

device_ids.description:
List of IDs of devices to remove from isolation.
Example: "cb509c17-7b88-461a-ba3b-3d43e29e6cd4","2c13685e-7d1f-4726-9ad3-5c8fa7718bab"

processed_device_ids.description: List of IDs of the devices removed from isolation
